title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4009.24 - Announcing payoff error
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4009.24 - Announcing payoff error

State Regulations

If an error is made in posting payoff figures on the
public commission, prior to the cashing of any pari-mutuel tickets affected by
such error, it shall be corrected promptly and a statement explaining the facts
made over the public address system. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4009.24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
